ModMetaData.name: Gene Extractor Menu Improvement
ModMetaData.author: Chrido
ModMetaData.description:
Struggling to manage your gene farm? This mod is your solution.
This mod improves the Gene Extractor "Insert Person..." menu, to make it easier to find the next pawn to insert.
Modifies "Insert Person..." menu to add "(fatal)" text after any pawns that will die if inserted.
Adds new menu "Safely insert prisoner...", it will only show prisoners that can have their genes extracted without killing them.
